high/tall/above average/loud/your (honorific)

sentences.english: So please spare your and your feet, I do not provoke any organizations and individuals.
sentences.chinese: 所以请您高抬贵手和贵脚，我不招惹任何组织和个人。

sentences.english: Please hold your hand and don't punish him.
sentences.chinese: 请高抬贵手，不要惩罚他。

sentences.english: Beside a reedy brook the scythe had bared.
sentences.chinese: 但那柄镰刀偏对一丛花高抬贵手。

definition: a person of great moral stature does not remember the offenses committed by one of low moral stature

open the net on one side (idiom); let the caged bird fly/to give one's opponent a way out/lenient treatment
